data.title: Palo Alto Medical Foundation Research Institute
data.text:
Network Acronym:

PAMFRI

Network Type:

Mixed Network (a combination of family medicine, internal medicine, pediatrics, nursing and/or other specialties)

Network Status:

Affiliate

Geo Location:

POINT (-122.157574 37.445797)

City:

Palo Alto

State:

California

Zip:

94301

Main Phone:

650 853-5014

Network Director Name:

Harold (Hal) Luft

Network Director Email:

lufth@pamfri.org

Geographic Coverage:

Regional

Practice/Clinic Location(s):

California

Network Mission Statement:

Our mission is to improve health and health care systems through innovative and actionable research.

Current or Past Research Interests / Health Conditions:

Arthritis and other non-traumatic joint disease (muscle, bone, joint conditions)*

Behavioral health

Cancer*

Cardiovascular disease including stroke and HTN*

Care transitions

Comparative effectiveness research

Coordination of care for complex patients

Depression and other mental health disorders*

Developmental delays, attention deficit hyperactivity disorder and autism*

Diabetes (Type 1 or 2)*

Health literacy

Immunizations

Infectious diseases including HIV/AIDS, STDs*

Men's health issues

Obesity*

Population health

Pregnancy and childbirth including preterm birth*

Prescription drug usage

Pulmonary disease/asthma*

Substance abuse (alcohol and drug abuse)*

Women's health issues

Approximate Number of PBRN Member Licensed Clinicians:

3393

Approximate Number of Practices or Clinics:

44

Approximate Number of Patients:

880000
